review.author: Frontend (Agent Teams)
review.findings: CSS performance audit fixes: (1) Killed 10+ infinite idle animations (paneBreathe, hexPulse drop-shadow, taskPulse, conflictPulse, heartbeat pulses, breathe/breatheDot). Preserved state-gated animations. (2) Removed backdrop-filter from .pane, .pane-header, .panel-tabs — replaced with solid backgrounds matching blurred appearance. Kept on .header only. (3) Replaced 22 transition:all with specific property lists — all verified to cover actual hover/active changes. Net -90 lines CSS. 91 suites / 2917 tests passing.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
